comments:
This is a minor problem and the correct code is generated... it just creates an 
error in the .log.

Steps to create this problem:
Open empty, drop a JPanel, drop a JButton, change the layout of the panel to 
GridbagLayout. The following (partial) stack trace shows up in the .log:

java.lang.Exception: New line delimiter added to new code: 1310
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.filebuffers.DocumentAdapter2.validateLine
Delimiters(DocumentAdapter2.java:431)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.filebuffers.DocumentAdapter2.replace
(DocumentAdapter2.java:345)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.CodeExpressionRef.updateDocument
(CodeExpressionRef.java:659)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.model.CodeExpressionRef.insertContentToDocu
ment(CodeExpressionRef.java:674)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.util.AbstractMethodTextGenerator.generateIn
Line(AbstractMethodTextGenerator.java:288)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BeanPartFactory.generateLocalVariable
(BeanPartFactory.java:90)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.BeanPartFactory.createFromJVEModel
(BeanPartFactory.java:515)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.MemberDecoderAdapter.createBeanInstanc
e(MemberDecoderAdapter.java:100)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.MemberDecoderAdapter.processMembers
(MemberDecoderAdapter.java:250)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.MemberDecoderAdapter.notifyChanged
(MemberDecoderAdapter.java:280)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.BasicNotifierImpl.eNotify
(BasicNotifierImpl.java:227)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotificationChainImpl.dispatch
(NotificationChainImpl.java:115)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotificationChainImpl.dispatch
(NotificationChainImpl.java:103)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotifyingListImpl.addAllUnique
(NotifyingListImpl.java:419)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.NotifyingListImpl.addAllUnique
(NotifyingListImpl.java:368)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.BasicEList.addAll(BasicEList.java:674)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.cde.commands.ApplyAttributeSettingCommand.execute
(ApplyAttributeSettingCommand.java:92)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.propertysheet.common.commands.CompoundCommand.appendAndE
xecute(CompoundCommand.java:414)

(CompoundCommand.java:217)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.propertysheet.common.commands.CompoundCommand.execute
(CompoundCommand.java:217)


Looks like a new code generator and template was introduced in  M7 (see 
InitExpressionGenerator and InitExpressionTemplate). This produces \r\n 
delimiters instead of the previous \n delimiter only.
I was using I20040311a and was not able to get the trace in the .log file.
M1 released, move all resolved to Verified, as prelude to closing.
M1 released, move all resolved/verified to Closed.

traces.message: New line delimiter added to new code: 1310
